name: Cauliflower Puree
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Break cauliflower into florets and steam or cook in boiling water until barely tender. Drain and run under cold water to stop cooking.
Place in a food processor and, using steel blade, process together with butter to a puree.
Season with salt, pepper, nutmeg and paprika. Refrigerate if desired.
To serve, heat thoroughly, thinning with milk if necessary.
